entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Some useless instructions pop up when I am using types with static interface method implementations #95549
  • InvokeAsync in Blazor WASM components calls into the caller thread instead of the UI thread. #95547
  • System.TypeLoadException occurred when there is static ReadOnlyMemory<> field #95544
  • `Directory.GetFiles` using a `searchPattern` of `"foo.*"` returns file named `"foo"` despite `'*'` being a simple wildcard according to the documentation #95541
  • Enable native PGO optimization for more native libraries #95537
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [Broken Build]: Linux build with ipv6 connectivity #95228
  • .NET 8 `QuicConnection` AuthenticationException: RemoteCertificateNameMismatch #95072
    9.0.0
  • ambiguous call on 'OptionsBuilderExtensions' #95524
    Future
  • Extreme Performance issues using SetMinimumLevel #94186
    Future
  • .Net 6.0 Application shows error prompt for ".Net Desktop Runtime" #93977
  • [wasi] Single file build fails with AOT #95273

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Build dominator tree sibling links in RPO #95550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify condition for building cross-Jits #95546
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Optimize ves_pinvoke_method () on wasm. #95545
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Revert "Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32" #95540
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: fix issue with out of order importer spilling around some calls #95539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not ignore coreclr.dll load failure in hostpolicy.dll #95538
    area-Host
  • Move most of the remaining Strong Name code to internal to the C++ file and remove duplicate validation #95536
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Consolidate wasi/wasm build bits #95535
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Disable EventSource tests #95498
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Fix/cleanup the encoding/decoding of runtime invoke wrappers. #95523
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Factor SSA's dominator tree computation #95507
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Use RemoteEndPoint host when TargetHost is missing #95518
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser] WS & HTTP clients more async #95483
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] eager allocation of Promise/Task result for async JSImport/JSExport #95411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove workaround for closed issue #95529
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Always unroll GT_STORE_BLK for blocks with gc refs on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix GC regions virtual alloc after #80295 #95526
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [System.Numerics] Cross Product for Vector2 and Vector4 #87968
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT: Added ARM64 SVE_GA_2A encoding #95435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Add arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CL_3A to IF_SVE_CU_3A #95514
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: alt jit range #95283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rework the special instantiation type logic to be more effective #95490
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Error out if SelfContained is not specified for Native AOT publish #95496
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Migrate to the 'locker' GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #95432
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Test macOS runtime test crash dump collection #93989
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix comments of Min/MaxMagnitude{Number} #95495
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: removed unneeded throw helper blocks #95379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
